thread.title: Oregon lawmaker to push bills outlawing businesses, unions with state contracts from making political donations
thread.title_full: Oregon lawmaker to push bills outlawing businesses, unions with state contracts from making political donations

author: Gordon R. Friedman | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Oregon lawmaker to push bills outlawing businesses, unions with state contracts from making political donations
text: SALEM -- Rep. Knute Buehler, R-Bend, said Monday that he plans to introduce legislation restricting so-called pay-to-play politics -- where businesses, nonprofits or labor unions holding contracts with the state give money to officials for their re-election effo
